comment._content: Sport. Olympic Games 1928 Amsterdam, Netherlands. A crowd of actors who pray near a big castle during an open air representation within the context of an art show

comment.author: 37324043@N00
comment._content:
Sport. Olympic Games 1928 Amsterdam, Netherlands. A crowd of actors who pray near a big castle during an open air representation within the context of an art show

--russian--

Спорт. Олимпийские Игры 1928 года, Амстердам. Актёры на поле возле большого замка во время представления на открытом воздухе.

comment.author: 7839660@N02
comment._content: I wouldn't call it a castle. It resembles the pylon (entrance gate with flanking towers) of an Egyptian temple.
